_data.text:
# About Customize css

## History

Hi, I'm **Haniel Hernández**, the creator of this framework, I'm a web developer from Nicaragua, this framework it's heavily inspire by Booststrap, Bulma and Tailwind css, taking some elements from all of them with some twicks here and there, the reason why it was created was to practice and improve my sass skills and as a hobby, currently the framework It's in a early stage and who knows whats goint to happend but I hope for the best.

## Get Involved

If you want learn more about sass and css, or take part of this project contact me at: 

- <https://github.com/HanielHernandez>
- haniel1121@outlook.com
_data.bodyPlainText:
About Customize css

History

Hi, I'm Haniel Hernández, the creator of this framework, I'm a web developer from Nicaragua, this framework it's heavily inspire by Booststrap, Bulma and Tailwind css, taking some elements from all of them with some twicks here and there, the reason why it was created was to practice and improve my sass skills and as a hobby, currently the framework It's in a early stage and who knows whats goint to happend but I hope for the best.

Get Involved

If you want learn more about sass and css, or take part of this project contact me at:

haniel1121@outlook.com

If you want to go strait to coding you can use this

_data.text:
# Customizable CSS docs

This is customizable css official documentation, It will be updated as new features are created

## Installation

You can install the package with **NPM**

### NPM

```bash 
npm i customizable-css
```

### Import

If you want customize some variables or override classes you can then import the main sass file in your own sass

```scss
@import "~customizable-css/css/main.scss";
```

### CDN

If you want to go strait to coding you can use this **CDN**

```html
<!-- CSS -->
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/customizable-css@1.1.2/css/main.min.css"
/>
<!-- Optional Javascript for Components -->
<script
  type="text/javascript"
  src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/customizable-css@1.1.2/js/main.js"
></script>
```

### Clone

Lastly you can clone the entire repo

```bash
  git clone https://github.com/HanielHernandez/custom-css.git
```
_data.bodyPlainText:
Customizable CSS docs
This is customizable css official documentation, It will be updated as new features are created
Installation
You can install the package with NPM
NPM
`bash
npm i customizable-css
`
Import
If you want customize some variables or override classes you can then import the main sass file in your own sass
`scss
@import "~customizable-css/css/main.scss";
`
CDN
If you want to go strait to coding you can use this CDN
`html
`
Clone
Lastly you can clone the entire repo
`bash
  git clone https://github.com/HanielHernandez/custom-css.git
`

_data.description: Learn how to use Customizable CSS Buttons
_data.title: Buttons

children.value: can be use to create a simple button, you can change the color of a button by using
there are 6 buttons size from 1 (smallest) to 6 (biggest), been size-2 the default size for button
you can create button groups by using a div with class

_data.text:
# Buttons ## Buttons types the class **.btn** can be use to create a simple button, you can change the color of a button by using **btn-{theme/color}** ```html ## Buttons sizes there are 6 buttons size from 1 (smallest) to 6 (biggest), been size-2 the default size for button ```html btn-size-2 btn-size-3 ``` btn-size-4 btn-size-5 btn-size-6 ## Buttons group you can create button groups by using a div with class **.btn-group** ```html
1 2 3
```
1 2 3
_data.bodyPlainText:
Buttons
Buttons types
the class .btn can be use to create a simple button, you can change the color of a button by using btn-{theme/color}
`html
   Default
   Primary
   Primary Outline
   Flat
   add
`
      Default button
      Primary button
      Primary Outline button
      Flat button
      add
Buttons sizes
there are 6 buttons size from 1 (smallest) to 6 (biggest), been size-2 the default size for button
`html
   btn-size-1
   btn-size-2
   btn-size-3
`
   btn-size-1
   btn-size-2
   btn-size-3
   btn-size-4
   btn-size-5
   btn-size-6
Buttons group
you can create button groups by using a div with class .btn-group
`html
    1
    2
    3
`

    2

_data.title: Modals

children.value: To create a modal frist you must create the trigger, a triggers is basically a element that include the class
then you can add content to the modal
is use to add transition animation but it can be disable by removing it.
You can change the max width of the modal content by using on of the following classes

_data.text:
# Modals ## Trigger a modal To create a modal frist you must create the trigger, a triggers is basically a element that include the class **.modal-trigger** and a data propert **data-target** set to the **modal element id** ```html
...
``` then you can add content to the modal ```html

My Modal title

Modal body goes here
```

My Modal title

Modal body goes here
the class modal **.modal-animated** is use to add transition animation but it can be disable by removing it. ## Modal sizes You can change the max width of the modal content by using on of the following classes
Class Width
deafult 600px
.modal-xxl 1400px
.modal-xl 1280px
.modal-lg 720px
.modal-sm 350px

Modals
Trigger a modal

  ...
`
then you can add content to the modal
`html

              option B

_data.text:
# Navbar ## Responsive Navbar You can create responsive navbar by adding a **.navbar-collapse-{breakpoint}**, encapsulating the **.nav** element with a **.nav-menu element**, and a adding a **.nav-toggler** button with a **data-target** perperty set to and id use by the **.nav-menu**, **.nav** will be hidden until the collapse breakpoint is reach, your final sctructure should look like this: * .navbar element with a .navbar-collpse-{breakpoint} class, this should contain the following elements: * **.brand** your brand or any element * **.nav-toggler** button with a **data-target property** set to the id of a **.nav-menu** element class * **.nav-menu element** with an id set to the **.nav-toggler data-target** value. this element yould contains * **.nav** element with your links or any other kind of element ```html
Brand
  • ...
  • ...
  • ...
``` this navbar will collpase on a screen bellow the md breakpoint
Brand
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
## Nav position you can change the position of the navigation by using some of the flexbox utilities ```html
Brand
    ...
```
Brand
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
## Navbar color You can also change the color of a sidebar by using the class **.navbar-{ theme/color }** ```html
...
...
...
```
Brand
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
Brand
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
Brand
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
Lastly you can set the position of a navbar to the top always by adding the class **.fixed** or **.sticky**, remember to add padding to the elements bellow otherwise the navbar elements will overlap
_data.bodyPlainText:
Navbar
Responsive Navbar
You can create responsive navbar by adding a .navbar-collapse-{breakpoint}, encapsulating the .nav element with a .nav-menu element, and a adding a .nav-toggler button with a data-target perperty set to and id use by the .nav-menu, .nav will be hidden until the collapse breakpoint is reach, your final sctructure should look like this:
.navbar element with a .navbar-collpse-{breakpoint} class, this should contain the following elements:
  .brand your brand or any element
  .nav-toggler button with a data-target property set to the id of a .nav-menu element class
  .nav-menu element with an id set to the .nav-toggler data-target value. this element yould contains
     .nav element with your links or any other kind of element
`html
        Brand
            menu
                    ...
                    ...
                    ...
`

            ...

`html
  ...
  ...

               Link 3

               Link 2
               Link 3
  Brand
               Link 1
               Link 2
               Link 3
Lastly you can set the position of a navbar to the top always by adding the class .fixed or .sticky, remember to add padding to the elements bellow otherwise the navbar elements will overlap

### Breadcrumb Nav You can use nav as breadcrumbs by ading the class **.breadcrumbs**, you can also add the class **.is-active** to a **.nav-link** in order show the current position of the breadcrumb. ```html

```

_data.description: Learn how to use Customizable CSS Breakpoints
_data.title: Breakpoints

children.value: You can use breakpoints in order to change the width of a column on diferent devices
I'm a full width on small screen but half on medium up
Im full width on sm, half on md and 1/4 on large

_data.text:
# Break Points ## Breakpoints list You can use breakpoints in order to change the width of a column on diferent devices
Prefix Container width Example
xl > 1280px col-w-xl-3
lg res > 1024 col-w-lg-4
md res > 768px col-w-md-6
sm res > 576px col-w-xl-12
none > 576px default col-3
``` html
I'm a full width on small screen but half on medium up
Im full width on sm, half on md and 1/4 on large
```

I'm a full width on small screen but half on medium up

I'm full width on sm, half on md and 1/3 on large

_data.title: Grid

children.value: will change the width of a column
col b p-4 bg-grey-400  b  br  col-w-4
you can also use fractions like
in oder to change width and
b p-4 bg-grey-400  b  br  w-3/4

_data.text:
# Grid ## Rows the **.row** class to set display to **flex** and **flex-direction** to **flex-row** ```html

I'm a div .row

I'm a div .col
I'm a div .col
I'm a div .col
```

I'm a div .row

I'm a div .col
I'm a div .col
I'm a div .col
## Columns the **.col** class set display to **flex** and **flex-direction** to **flex-column** ``` html

I'm a div .col

I'm a div .row
I'm a div .row
I'm a div .col
```

I'm a div .col

I'm a div .row
I'm a div .row
I'm a div .col
### Column width the class **.col-w-{ 1-12 }** will change the width of a column ``` html
I'm a div .col-w-4
I'm a div .col-w-8
```
I'm a div .col-w-4
I'm a div .col-w-8
### Fractions you can also use fractions like **.w-1/2** , **w-3/4**, **w-2/6** **w-4/12** in oder to change width and **h-1/2** **h-3/4** etc. ``` html
I'm a div .w-3/4
I'm a div .w-6/12
```
I'm a div .w-3/4
I'm a div .w-6/12

`html
        I'm a div .row

        I'm a div .col
        I'm a div .col
`
        I'm a div .row
        I'm a div .col
        I'm a div .col
        I'm a div .col
Columns
the .col class set display to flex and flex-direction to flex-column
` html
        I'm a div .col
        I'm a div .row
        I'm a div .row
        I'm a div .col
`
        I'm a div .col
        I'm a div .row
        I'm a div .row
        I'm a div .col
Column width
the class .col-w-{ 1-12 }  will change the width of a column
` html
        I'm a div .col-w-4
        I'm a div .col-w-8
`
        I'm a div .col-w-4
        I'm a div .col-w-8
Fractions
you can also use fractions like .w-1/2 , w-3/4, w-2/6 w-4/12 in oder to change width and h-1/2 h-3/4 etc.
` html
        I'm a div .w-3/4
        I'm a div .w-6/12
`

        I'm a div .w-6/12

# Forms Fields ## Form field you can createa simple form field with the class **.form-field** ```html
this field is required
```
this field is required
## Invalid Form field In order to indicate an invalid form field you can add the class **.invalid** to an existing **.form-field** ```html
this field is required
```
this field is required
## Horizontal Form Field You can make horizontal fields by adding the class **.horizontal** into a form field ```html
this field is required
```
## Form Field with addons you can adds addons by encapsulating the field and addon on a **div** with the **.with-addons** class ```html
```

_data.description: Learn how to use Customizable CSS Border and border radius classes.
_data.title: Colors

children.value: to asing borders to an element
You can also change border-color to a theme color by using the class
you can change the borders direction by using the classes
The border radius can also be change by using the classes
to change it intensity, the class
You can change the border radius of and expecific conner  by using
r{t for top, b for bottom }-{ l for left , r for right}-{ number from 2 - 12}

_data.text:
# Borders And Border Radius ## Borders You can use the class **.b** to asing borders to an element ```html
div with .b class
```
div with .b class
### Border Color You can also change border-color to a theme color by using the class **.b-{theme-color}** ```html
div with .b and .b-blue-600 class
```
div with .b and .b-blue-600 class
### Border direction you can change the borders direction by using the classes **bt** (border-top) ,**bb** (border-boittom) ,**br** (border-right), **bl** (border-lef) and **by** and **bx** ```html
```
## Border Radius The border radius can also be change by using the classes **.r** or **r-{number from 2 - 12}** to change it intensity, the class **.r-full** will made an element **border-radius:50%;**; ```html
```
### Border Radius Positions You can change the border radius of and expecific conner by using **r{t for top, b for bottom }-{ l for left , r for right}-{ number from 2 - 12}** class ```html
```

inline-block p-12 bg-primary text-dark w-1/2 w-md-12/12
you change text color property of a div by using the classes
In order to make the main css file lighter we do not create themes for all the suported colors, only the 600 variation (
), you can create theme for on of those colors like this:
// Create your entire theme base on the color
this is the offical list of the colors suported:

_data.text:
# Colors ## Background colors you change background color property of a div by using the classes **.bg-{theme name /color}**. ```html

div with .bg-dark

div with .bg-primary

```

div with .bg-dark

div with .bg-primary

## Text Color you change text color property of a div by using the classes **.text-{theme name/color}**.

text with primary color

text with text-red-600 color

text with green 600

## Import suported colors In order to make the main css file lighter we do not create themes for all the suported colors, only the 600 variation (**blue-600**), you can create theme for on of those colors like this: ```scss // Get the color variant $color: get-color("red", 600); // Create your entire theme base on the color @include create-theme("red-500", $color); ``` ## Suported Colors this is the offical list of the colors suported:
_data.bodyPlainText:
Colors
Background colors
you change background color property of a div by using the classes .bg-{theme name /color}.
`html
    div with .bg-dark
    div with .bg-primary
`
                                div with .bg-dark
                                div with .bg-primary
Text Color
you change text color property of a div by using the classes .text-{theme name/color}.
                            text with primary color
                            text with text-red-600 color
                            text with green 600
Import suported colors
In order to make the main css file lighter we do not create themes for all the suported colors, only the 600 variation (blue-600), you can create theme for on of those colors like this:
`scss
// Get the color variant
$color: get-color("red", 600);
// Create your entire theme base on the color
@include create-theme("red-500", $color);
`
Suported Colors
this is the offical list of the colors suported:

_data.description: Learn how to use Customizable CSS flexbox utilities.
_data.title: Flexbox

children.value: By default you can use the class
You can change flex-wrap property with the following classes:
Adding class flex 1  to a children of a flex element will make then growth same sime;
Adding class flex auto  to a children of a flex element will make then growth if its content is bigger ;
Adding class flex none  to a children of a flex element will make then not to grow or shrink in order to fill its parent

_data.text:
# Flexbox utilities By default you can use the class **.row** and **.col** to set flex direction ## Justiy You can change flexbox **justify-content** and **aling-items** with the following classes ```html
...
...
...
```

col
col
## Align ```html

...

col
col
col
col
col
## Flex Wrap You can change flex-wrap property with the following classes:
Class Porperty Value
.flex-no-wrap flex-wrap:none;
.flex-wrap flex-wrap:wrap;
.flex-wrap-reverse flex-wrap:wrap-reverse;
### No wrap ```html
...
```
col of 4
col of 4
col of 6
### Wrap ```html
...
```
col of 4
col of 4
col of 6
### Wrap Reverse ```html

col of 4
col of 4
col of 6
## Shrink and Grow yi you can
Class Porperty Value
.flex-s flex-shrink:1;
.flex-s-0 flex-shrink:none;
.flex-g flex-grow:1;
.flex-g-0 flex-grow:0;
## Flex ### Flex 1 Adding class flex 1 to a children of a flex element will make then growth same sime; ```html
1
2
3
```

### Flex auto Adding class flex auto to a children of a flex element will make then growth if its content is bigger ; ```html
1
2

```
Long text blabablabablabablabablabablaba
Nomal text
Normal text
### Flex None Adding class flex none to a children of a flex element will make then not to grow or shrink in order to fill its parent ```html
1

```

Nomal text
Normal text

_data.description: Learn how to use Customizable CSS Overflow classes.
_data.title: Overflow

children.value: you can set the overflow property of a div by using the follwing classes:
You can also set overflow property base on a breakpoint

_data.text:
## Overflow you can set the overflow property of a div by using the follwing classes:
ClassProperty
.overflow-visibleoverflow: visible;
.overflow-hiddenoverflow: hidden;
.overflow-clipoverflow: clip;
.overflow-scrolloverflow: scroll;
.overflow-autooverflow: auto;
.overflow-x-visibleoverflow-x: visible;
.overflow-x-hiddenoverflow-x: hidden;
.overflow-x-clipoverflow-x: clip;
.overflow-x-scrolloverflow-x: scroll;
.overflow-x-autooverflow-x: auto;
.overflow-y-visibleoverflow-y: visible;
.overflow-y-hiddenoverflow-y: hidden;
.overflow-y-clipoverflow-y: clip;
.overflow-y-scrolloverflow-y: scroll;
.overflow-y-autooverflow-y: auto;
You can also set overflow property base on a breakpoint
_data.bodyPlainText:
Overflow
you can set the overflow property of a div by using the follwing classes:
                        ClassProperty.overflow-visibleoverflow: visible;.overflow-hiddenoverflow: hidden;.overflow-clipoverflow: clip;.overflow-scrolloverflow: scroll;.overflow-autooverflow: auto;.overflow-x-visibleoverflow-x: visible;.overflow-x-hiddenoverflow-x: hidden;.overflow-x-clipoverflow-x: clip;.overflow-x-scrolloverflow-x: scroll;.overflow-x-autooverflow-x: auto;.overflow-y-visibleoverflow-y: visible;.overflow-y-hiddenoverflow-y: hidden;.overflow-y-clipoverflow-y: clip;.overflow-y-scrolloverflow-y: scroll;.overflow-y-autooverflow-y: auto;

_data.description: Learn how to use Customizable CSS Padding and Margin classes.
_data.title: Padding and Margin

children.value: You can set padding and margin by using the class
, youn can also use modifers like
for left in order to spiciy the side of the div to add padding

_data.text:
# Padding and Margin You can set padding and margin by using the class **.p-{number from 1 to 24}** or **m-{number from 1 to 24}** , youn can also use modifers like **b** for botom or, **t** for top, **r** for right and **l** for left in order to spiciy the side of the div to add padding
Class Property
m-*{0-12} / p-*{0-12} padding / margin: number * 0.25rem;
mt-*{0-12} / pt-*{0-12} padding-top / margin-top: number * 0.25rem;
mb-*{0-12} / pb-*{0-12} padding-bottom / margin-bottom: number * 0.25rem;
ml-*{0-12} / pl-*{0-12} padding-left / / margin-left: number * 0.25rem;
mr-*{0-12} / pr-*{0-12} padding-right / margin-right: number * 0.25rem;
``` html
im a div with .p-2 class
im a div with .p-4 class
im a div with .p-8 class
im a div with .mb-2 class
im a div with .mb-4 class
im a div with .mb-6 class
```

im a div with .p-4 class

im a div with .mb-2 class
im a div with .mb-4 class
im a div with .mb-6 class

children.value: you can set the position property of a div by using one of the following classes
, to use it you ony need to follo this:

_data.text:
# Positions you can set the position property of a div by using one of the following classes
ClassProperty
.fixedposition: fixed;
.absoluteposition: absolute;
.relativeposition: relative;
.stickyposition: sticky;
.initialposition: initial;
.inheritposition: inherit;
positions can also work with **breakpoints**, to use it you ony need to follo this: **.position-{ breakpoint }-{position value}***
_data.bodyPlainText:

                    ClassProperty.fixedposition: fixed;.absoluteposition: absolute;.relativeposition: relative;.stickyposition: sticky;.initialposition: initial;.inheritposition: inherit;
positions can also work with breakpoints, to use it you ony need to follo this: .position-{ breakpoint }-{position value}*

# Font and Text

## Text aligment

You can align text with the following classes

<text-aligment-table></text-aligment-table>

## Font sizes 

You can use the default font sizes as follow

<font-sizes-table>

Or your can use a font size base on rem values

<font-rem-sizes-table>
</font-rem-sizes-table>


## Font weigth

you can change font weigth with the following classes

<font-weight-table>
</font-weight-table>

_data.description: Learn how to use customizable css Transitions and hover classes.
_data.title: Transitions and Hover

children.value: you can change some properties on hover by using the
You can send transitions-property property by using one of the following classes
You can send transitions-duration property by using the class
and transitions-timing property by using the class
p-4 bg-blue-600 hover:bg-red-600 hover:text-grey-600 transtion-color duration-200 timing-linear

_data.text:
# Transitions and Hover ## Hover you can change some properties on hover by using the **.hover:{border, bacground, text color class}** class
Hover over me
```html
Hover over me
``` ## Trasitions You can send transitions-property property by using one of the following classes
Class Properties
.transition-all all
.transition-colors color, background-color, border-color, opacity
.transition-width width
.transition-height width
.transition-size width, height
You can send transitions-duration property by using the class **.duration-{ multiple of 100 }** and transitions-timing property by using the class **.timing-{linear,ease-in ,ease-out,easin-out}** ```html
Hover over me
```
Hover over me
_data.bodyPlainText:
Transitions and Hover
Hover
you can change some properties on hover by using the .hover:{border, bacground, text color class} class
		Hover over me
`html
	Hover over me
`
Trasitions
You can send transitions-property property by using one of the following classes
							Class
							Properties
					 .transition-all
							all
					 .transition-colors
							color, background-color, border-color, opacity
					 .transition-width
							width
					 .transition-height
							width
					 .transition-size
							width, height
You can send transitions-duration property by using the class .duration-{ multiple of 100 } and transitions-timing property by using the class .timing-{linear,ease-in ,ease-out,easin-out}
`html
